page.title: 18Racism in Govanhill
page.content: The following survey was conducted by a 4th. Year pupil in Shawlands Academy into the extent of racism in the Govanhill area. This area has an estimated black population of 20%. The survey received replies from 80 white and 80 black people. 80% of black people had experienced some sort of racial abuse. 81% of people replied that racial harrasment is getting worse in Govanhill. 82% of blacks interviewed said that they would not wish to change to a more western way of life. Of the whites surveyed 64% felt that racial abuse was getting worse over the last five years. 84% of whites felt that their children should be taught multi-cultural education.
